description:
Join One of the Web's Leading Professional Development Communities

Course version 3.1 released August 15th, 2015

Create an American Style Resume to Win that Dream job

Looking to stand out from the crowd? You already know how transformational an opportunity with an organization like Google, P&G, Facebook, and other mulitnational companies can be for your career (and for your life). In this project-based course, you'll move step by step through the process of creating an absolutely stunning resume for yourself. As a participant in the course, you'll get lifetime access to:

  • Beautifully produced video lectures presented in HD and designed by Eazl's team of recruiters, researchers, and animators based in San Francisco
  • A professional community led by former a former Bay Area Fortune 500 Recruiter Davis Jones
  • 4 American-style resume templates used by people paying $1500/resume
  • A library of 20+ professionally-written and formatted resumes for candidates with a variety of backgrounds that you can use as you build your own resume
  • A downloadable Power Language Tool to help you design powerful resume content
  • A downloadable step by step resume building guide

Lifetime Access to Frequently Updated Material

This course is consistently updated by Eazl's San Francisco-based team. If you need to prepare for a job hunt in the future, you can instantly come back and access the highest quality, most up-to-date resume writing strategies right here. For life.
title: The Resume Project: Build the Ultimate American Style Resume
instructors: Davis Jones, Team Eazl, Team Eazl
